Introduction to R for Biologists Alana Schick 2020-03-13 1 Welcome Workshop material will be added here as we go along. For each day of the workshop, the basic material will be uploaded and more details will be added based on your questions and problems we encounter. So please ask as many questions are you can to help us in making this workshop better!!
